experience.description: Development and maintenance of SaaS platforms supporting automotive service operations, customer management, marketing automation, and telematics-based solutions.
highlights: Built a multi-service SaaS platform including appointment management, marketing system, dynamic page builder, URL shortener, and telematics integration.
Implemented and documented data optimizations achieving ~33.33% improvement in storage efficiency.
Developed a Deep Neural Network model covering 14 vehicle problem categories, contributing to ~10% increase in customer satisfaction.
Improved server query response time by ~15% through microservices architecture, distributed communication services, and CI/CD pipeline optimization.
